name: Just Beat'em Up - DEMO 2019
description: Just Beat Em Up : World of Fury © is a "side-scrolling beat'em up" that brings you back to the golden age of arcade games. Fight alone or with a friend and beat up all your foes. Escape from the prison of the desert, indulge yourself in the pursuit of general Bombix and foil Iron Muscle's evil schemes. You will face many dangers through thirty different levels, all accompanied by explosive music tracks.
